detectors.description:
Andreea.slitherConstructorVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Andreea.sol#14-85) uses literals with too many digits:
	- initialSupply = 3000000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Andreea.sol#16)
detectors.markdown:
[Andreea.slitherConstructorVariables()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Andreea.sol#L14-L85) uses literals with too many digits:
	- [initialSupply = 3000000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Andreea.sol#L16)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Andreea.sol#4)
	- Andreea.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Andreea.sol#23-25)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Andreea.sol#5)
	- Andreea.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Andreea.sol#29-31)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Andreea.sol#6)
	- Andreea.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Andreea.sol#33-35)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Andreea.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Andreea.sol#69-73)
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Andreea.sol#8)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Andreea.sol#9)
	- Andreea.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Andreea.sol#37-46)
